item.title: Huge potholes, 18th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes on the slip road, going up to the flyerover, crumbling road between the 2 lanes as you come onto the slip road, then further up a huge pothole that could now fit a tyre into it (due to it being there for months with no sign of repair) and another forming right next to it now, which means you need to swerve to avoid them. This is extremly dangerous.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cole Close, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This car alarm has been sounding since the weekend., 18th February
item.description:
Constant noise from car alarm since the weekend. A number of messages left for the owner but no response and the alarm is going off 24 hours it is a significant noise issue and can be heard by residents inside homes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Mead Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Column 23 Beckenham Road, Beckenham, 18th February
item.description:
